Step 5 eventListeners

Nov 12, 2018 • Marcus

Now it’s time for eventListeners.

So in our HTLM we got this button

we want to listen if the user clicks on it and execute a function if the button gets clicked inside the parenthesis of eventListener the first parameter is what event to listen for and the second is what to do if that event is detected. in this case, run the function “youClicked”.

Adding event parameter. The name can be whatever but is usualy event or e.

All avaliable events you can listen for
